data.text: Mano kaka midhiero omaka malit!
Joma oluoro Nyasaye bende osetieki morumo e piny;
Lweteni duto ariyo olony e timo richo.
Joma nenore ni longʼo kuomgi; chalo gi kuth oriangʼ.
Kik igen kuom ngʼama odak e bathi
Nikech wuowi koro ochayo wuon mare,
Anto amanyo Jehova Nyasaye gi wangʼa ka an kod geno,
In jasika kik inyiera
Nikech aseketho e nyim Jehova Nyasaye
Eka wasika none gima otimore
Odiechiengʼ migeroe ohinga mare biro chopo,
E odiechiengʼno ji nobi iri
Piny biro dongʼ nono,
Kwa jogi gi ludh odunga mari,
“Mana kaka ndalo mane ua Misri,
Ogendini biro nenogi mi wigi kuodi
Gibiro nangʼo lowo ka thuol,
En Nyasaye mane machalo kodi
Ibiro kechowa kendo,
Ibiro bedo ja-adiera ne Jakobo
